item.title: Let's send food to Imgurians in need
item.description:
Happy almost weekend everyone! If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been such a big help in feeding more people, we love you so much! https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 6pm central
Puckett is here to show you how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
6 more hours to help as many people as we can Lets get it going! ... Today's Meal Tally 1245 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th by @OP 120 5th and 6th by Pizza Angel @pot314 133 7th, 8th, 9th and 10th by @OP 155 11th and 12th by Pizza Angel @ayatollahbahloni 205 13th by Pizza Angel @weasel 230 14th and 15th by Pizza Angel @arandomnun 250 16th and 17th by Pizza Angel @pot314 315 18th and 19th by Pizza Angel @ARandomNun 333 20th, 21st, 22nd and Michael Jordan by @OP Kobe Bryant and 25th by Pizza Angel @Jaenen ... Today's Grocery Tally 600 1st by @OP
item.dc:creator: TheFreePizzaDude

item.title: The Story of Gilly
item.description:
Good morning, new friends! I wanted to share a unique story about Gilly. A sweet and ambitious sphinx who found herself homeless after a backyard breeding operation gone wrong. Has anyone heard of FIP? FIP is now detectable and treatable thanks to modern medicine!! I love this little gargoyle.
Immediately after I saved her, I took her to the one and only Dr. Wesley, the Greater Huntsville Humane Society’s Shelter veterinarian. Quick sidebar: this guy goes above and beyond, clears his schedule, and ensures rescue animals receive the best care. We found out not only that she was FIP-positive, but also that she had three parasites that were contagious not only to other animals but also to humans. At four months old, no animals should have to go through all of this, but unfortunately, Gilly did. Did I tell you she had a dislocated hip? Ughhh
With all of the things and all of the symptoms, she faced them all. G.I. was upset, had inflammation from infections, and was hospitalized at the ER for 4 days, but somehow pulled through. The sweet Foster cat of mine has given us a ride on a roller coaster we were not prepared for. Luckily, our supporters and team are amazing, and we were able to pull through.
She's out! After she crashed, she needed to stay with the team. I took her back home after this. The staff said, “When your chicken breast is on the loose,” haha, she's a character. I love her and want her, buuuttttt I can't keep on keeping them. There's more to save!
She is now back home, receiving her life-saving medication, not once, but for a second round. I will go to Great Lengths to make sure she survives this to go to her forever home! Fun fact: a celebrity may or may not be adopting her after a clear bill of health ?. Pray for Gilly and pray that she continues to thrive and become healthy.
item.dc:creator: AlabamaAnimalRescuer

item.title: SOMEONE WAKE ME UP! This can't be for REAL! :D
item.description: SO! lol, this is just insane I still think I'm going to wake up from this dream. I made a Ko-fi Shop to sell digital items ( Basically it's a Txt.doc with information that can be copied and pasted into another program in a game for use that helps them out ) It's take a lot of work to create these digital items but I never for the life of me expected it to go over so well! There as been a FLOOD of support on my Ko-fi page and I've been making sooo much money! It's so surreal, I'm finally able to buy parts to build a NEW PC with this turn of events! My PC is 15years old so being able to buy a new 2026 PC is a dream come true! If this keep's up I'll be able to start saving for a new/used Car since mine recently died and I had to sell it to a chop shop for 350$ because I couldnt afford to get it repaired at the time. For once in the past 5 years something good has happened to me!! :D Hopefully this good luck streak keeps up! If I can get an E-bike before the car I'll be able to get a part time job that I can't walk or commute to quickly/cheaply. I'm currently trying to find a job in HVAC, I'd love to get an apprenticeship or on the job training position vs going to a tradeskill school and rack up debt! For now I'm just so HAPPY! :D It's been so long I've felt this way I hope it last!! :D Wish me luck friends :D Happy Friday the 13th! Seems to follow my luck trend the day things are ment to go wrong for people. My day turned out great! lmao.
item.dc:creator: CountryGuyMike

item.title: GovBrief Today #378
item.description: Donald Trump's government condemned the planet today by eliminating the climate change endangerment finding that has been global scientific consensus for decades. They also told a Senate committee after watching a video in slow motion that Alex Pretti was "fighting back nonstop" when federal agents shot him while he was pinned to the ground. In Minneapolis, prosecutors quietly asked a judge to dismiss the charges against a man other agents shot 10 days before Pretti was killed. They had no evidence to support the arrest of the second of three people they shot in 17 terrifying January days. Border czar Tom Homan said today they would leave Minnesota, but thousands remain jailed and a federal judge had to order ICE to let detainees contact their lawyers. As Orwell wrote in 1984, "The Party told you to reject the evidence of your eyes and ears. It was their final, most essential command." Call or write your state attorney general and demand they challenge the EPA revocation in court. Multiple AGs are already preparing to sue. Make sure yours is one of them. We've emailed over 6,100 stories over 378 straight nights. The algorithm doesn't always show them to you. Subscribe now at govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/ford-iran [2] https://go.govbrief.today/moderna-rejection [3] https://go.govbrief.today/leqaa-kordia-jailing [4] https://go.govbrief.today/endangerment-finding-repealed [5] https://go.govbrief.today/ftc-apple-news [6] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-again-skips [7] https://go.govbrief.today/pentagon-blocked-kelly [8] https://go.govbrief.today/syria-base-exit [9] https://go.govbrief.today/fbi-assessment [10] https://go.govbrief.today/gabbard-kushner [11] https://go.govbrief.today/slater-resigns [12] https://go.govbrief.today/health-grant-freeze-blocked [13] https://go.govbrief.today/judge-ice-attorneys [14] https://go.govbrief.today/venezuelan-deportees-order [15] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-football-pardons [16] https://go.govbrief.today/minn-ice-withdrawal [17] https://go.govbrief.today/pretti-senate-hearing [18] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-shooting-dismissal [19] https://go.govbrief.today/dhs-shutdown-vote [20] https://go.govbrief.today/johnson-doj-tracking [21] https://go.govbrief.today/carl-nomination [22] https://go.govbrief.today/pirro-sues-hometown [23] https://go.govbrief.today/stonewall-flag-raised Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com

item.title: Short meme Dump - Memes I shared with my husband #3
item.description:
All about that Do not Disturb life.
Calathea. Calathea. Calathea. Say it with me once more Calathea....Roseoptica.
I can't even be made, raccoons are so cute.
Listen 50% of a glow up is learning to hide or reduce your 'flaws', but really who cares, let those big ears fly!
As an ED sufferer I don't like most food, but this tweet is very much my husband's 'energy', he's a stellar partner.
Knife wreeeeench (for kids)
Beautiful kitty cat and a beautiful gem...crystal...I am not good with geology.
His advice is sound though.
Jamaican me kind of uncomfortable...
Then you realise you can only play the auto-shield character forever....because you have no idea how to block or dodge otherwise.
That's ok, I give much more than I take...
Why are we this way?!?!?
I just set an alarm for him on my phone now. It works.
What about 'fair', though? Does this mean the same thing?
Likes tax: Currently re-reading the stunning Rai-Kirah trilogy by Carol Berg. I met Ms Berg at signing/fan event when I was 18 and I still enjoy these many, many years later. Have you read them? Side note: Anyone else having trouble with the mobile app not loading anything?
item.dc:creator: scotswahey

item.title: I don’t know how this meme works actually
item.description: You guys I’ve been so depressed with the state of the world but tonight I was looking through Pinterest at a ton of art videos and human creation is just the most beautiful thing in the world and I’m feeling so inspired now that I’m going to buy crayons tomorrow and color a bunch of cats and maybe even Nessie- I’m so excited. Also Walmart trips aren’t even that bad (I LOVE talking to people) but I just had to tell you guys and I don’t know how the other memes work either
